responses.rationale: Factual report of a rare case without explicit framing cues.
'concerning' is a psychological verb not paired with vivid intensifier or scale of harm.
Factual report of a confirmation without explicit framing cues.
'remain safe for consumers' is an explicit food safety assurance (Reassuring cue).
Factual report of discovery and consequence without explicit framing cues.
'highly pathogenic' is a technical term. Factual report without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of a confirmation without explicit framing cues.
'considered rare' is an explicit low-risk statement (Reassuring cue).
Factual report of historical events and scale without explicit framing cues.
'reigniting fears' is a psychological verb not paired with vivid intensifier or scale of harm.
'high mortality rates' is a technical description. Factual report without explicit framing cues.

'highly pathogenic' is a technical term. Factual report of detection without explicit framing cues.

Factual report of sequence of events without explicit framing cues.
'highly contagious' is technical term. 'furthering a threat' is descriptive, not vivid/amplified.
Factual report of case locations and types without explicit framing cues.
'will not enter the food system' and 'strongest AI surveillance program' are explicit calming cues.
'strongest AI surveillance program' and 'do not present an immediate public health concern' are explicit calming cues.

'primarily an animal health issue at this time' is an explicit low-risk statement (Reassuring cue).
